013package org.apache.juneau.examples.core.config.store;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.Utils2.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
017
018import java.util.*;
019import java.util.concurrent.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.config.store.*;
023
024/**
025 * Example of a {@link ConfigStore} that uses a relational database as a backend.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 * This class provides a basic framework but requires implementing the following methods:
029 * <ul class='javatree'>
030 *    <li class='jm'>{@link #getDatabaseValue(String)}
031 *    <li class='jm'>{@link #exists(String)}
032 * </ul>
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
035 * </ul>
036 */
037@SuppressWarnings({"resource","unused","javadoc"})
038public class SqlStore extends ConfigStore {
039
040   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
041   // Static
042   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
043
044   static final String
045      SQLSTORE_jdbcUrl = "SqlStore.jdbcUrl",
046      SQLSTORE_tableName = "SqlStore.tableName",
047      SQLSTORE_nameColumn = "SqlStore.nameColumn",
048      SQLSTORE_valueColumn = "SqlStore.valueColumn",
049      SQLSTORE_pollInterval = "SqlStore.pollInterval";
050
051
052   /**
053    * Instantiates a builder for this object.
054    *
055    * @return A new builder for this object.
056    */
057   public static Builder create() {
058      return new Builder();
059   }
060
061   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
062   // Builder
063   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
064
065   /**
066    * Builder class.
067    */
068   public static class Builder extends ConfigStore.Builder {
069
070      String jdbcUrl, tableName, nameColumn, valueColumn;
071      int pollInterval;
072
073      Builder() {
074         this.jdbcUrl = env(SQLSTORE_jdbcUrl, "jdbc:derby:mydb");
075         this.tableName = env(SQLSTORE_tableName, "config");
076         this.nameColumn = env(SQLSTORE_nameColumn, "name");
077         this.valueColumn = env(SQLSTORE_valueColumn, "value");
078         this.pollInterval = env(SQLSTORE_pollInterval, 600);  // Time in seconds.
079      }
080
081      /**
082       * Sets the JDBC URL for the database connection.
083       *
084       * @param value The JDBC URL.
085       * @return This object.
086       */
087      public Builder jdbcUrl(String value) {
088         this.jdbcUrl = value;
089         return this;
090      }
091
092      /**
093       * Sets the name of the database table containing configuration entries.
094       *
095       * @param value The table name.
096       * @return This object.
097       */
098      public Builder tableName(String value) {
099         this.tableName = value;
100         return this;
101      }
102
103      /**
104       * Sets the name of the column containing configuration entry names.
105       *
106       * @param value The column name.
107       * @return This object.
108       */
109      public Builder nameColumn(String value) {
110         this.nameColumn = value;
111         return this;
112      }
113
114      /**
115       * Sets the name of the column containing configuration entry values.
116       *
117       * @param value The column name.
118       * @return This object.
119       */
120      public Builder valueColumn(String value) {
121         this.valueColumn = value;
122         return this;
123      }
124
125      /**
126       * Sets the polling interval in seconds for checking database changes.
127       *
128       * @param value The polling interval in seconds.
129       * @return This object.
130       */
131      public Builder pollInterval(int value) {
132         this.pollInterval = value;
133         return this;
134      }
135
136      @Override
137      public Builder copy() {
138         return null;
139      }
140
141      @Override
142      public SqlStore build() {
143         return build(SqlStore.class);
144      }
145   }
146
147   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
148   // Instance
149   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
150
151   private final String jdbcUrl;
152   private final String tableName, nameColumn, valueColumn;
153   private final Timer watcher;
154   private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,String> cache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
155
156   /**
157    * Constructor.
158    *
159    * @param builder The builder for this object.
160    */
161   protected SqlStore(Builder builder) {
162      super(builder);
163      this.jdbcUrl = builder.jdbcUrl;
164      this.tableName = builder.tableName;
165      this.nameColumn = builder.nameColumn;
166      this.valueColumn = builder.valueColumn;
167
168      var pollInterval = builder.pollInterval;
169
170      var timerTask = new TimerTask() {
171         @Override
172         public void run() {
173            SqlStore.this.poll();
174         }
175      };
176
177      this.watcher = new Timer("MyTimer");
178      watcher.scheduleAtFixedRate(timerTask, 0, pollInterval * 1000);
179   }
180
181   synchronized void poll() {
182
183      // Loop through all our entries and find the latest values.
184      cache.forEach((name,cacheContents) -> {
185         var newContents = getDatabaseValue(name);
186
187         // Change detected!
188         if (! cacheContents.equals(newContents))
189            update(name, newContents);
190      });
191   }
192
193   // Reads the value from the database.
194   protected String getDatabaseValue(String name) {
195      // Implement me!
196      return null;
197   }
198
199   @Override /* ConfigStore */
200   public boolean exists(String name) {
201      // Implement me!
202      return false;
203   }
204
205   @Override /* ConfigStore */
206   public synchronized String read(String name) {
207      var contents = cache.get(name);
208      if (contents == null) {
209         contents = getDatabaseValue(name);
210         update(name, contents);
211      }
212      return contents;
213   }
214
215   @Override /* ConfigStore */
216   public synchronized String write(String name, String expectedContents, String newContents) {
217
218      // This is a no-op.
219      if (Utils.eq(expectedContents, newContents))
220         return null;
221
222      var currentContents = read(name);
223
224      if (expectedContents != null && Utils.ne(currentContents, expectedContents))
225         return currentContents;
226
227      update(name, newContents);
228
229      // Success!
230      return null;
231   }
232
233   @Override /* ConfigStore */
234   public synchronized SqlStore update(String name, String newContents) {
235      cache.put(name, newContents);
236      super.update(name, newContents);  // Trigger any listeners.
237      return this;
238   }
239
240   @Override /* Closeable */
241   public synchronized void close() {
242      if (watcher != null)
243         watcher.cancel();
244   }
245}
